title: LIVE Tom Silvagni sentence
description: The son of AFL great Stephen Silvagni will learn his fate for raping a woman, less than a fortnight after he was convicted.  Tom Silvagni, 23, denied he digitally raped the victim twice in the early hours of January 14, 2024 at his Melbourne home, but a Victorian County Court jury rejected his story.  He was instead found guilty of two counts of rape on December 5 and is due to be sentenced on Wednesday morning.
